text: The Cathedral of Cartagena (also called Cathedral of Santa Mar√≠a la Vieja) was a cathedral of the Diocese of Cartagena. It was in the old town of Cartagena. It has been in ruins since 1939, when it was destroyed in the Spanish Civil War. ==Other websites== Category:Roman Catholic cathedrals in Spain Category:Cartagena Category:Ruins
title: Cartagena Cathedral
